- [Home](https://s.ventures/): Bring your next venture to life. At S Ventures we have spent the last 20 years acquiring premium internet real estate to use for our own ventures ranging from software &amp; cutting-edge AI platforms to physical products, e-commerce, and home &amp; financial services. In this industry, as you may already know, there are many times that a project or idea never gets off the ground, or a brand name we thought was the perfect fit ends up being second-best. So while we wait for these projects to come to life, or invest in other ventures, we have decided to offer [&hellip;]
